name: hodr-monorepo
author: Sven Johansson
description: A framework for building and routing modular service interactions with verified, transformable contracts between steps.

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:koa-plugin && npm run build:axios-plugin && npm run build:web-inspector-plugin && npm run build:zod-plugin
scripts.test: npm --workspace @hodr/core run test && npm --workspace @hodr/zod-plugin run test
